verses.verse: וַתֵּ֣רֶא <WH7200> saw רָחֵ֗ל <WH7354> And when Rachel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> no יָֽלְדָה֙ <WH3205> that she bare לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וַתְּקַנֵּ֥א <WH7065> envied רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> no children Rachel בַּאֲחֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> her sister וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> unto Jacob הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> Give לִּ֣י בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> me children וְאִם־ <WH518> or אַ֖יִן <WH369> or else מֵתָ֥ה <WH4191> I die אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> anger יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob's בְּרָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> against Rachel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said הֲתַ֤חַת <WH8478> the place אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [Am] I in God's אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who מָנַ֥ע <WH4513> stead who hath withheld מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> at פְּרִי־ <WH6529> from thee the fruit בָֽטֶן׃ <WH990> belly

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Here אֲמָתִ֥י <WH519> Behold my maid בִלְהָ֖ה <WH1090> Bilhah בֹּ֣א <WH935> go in אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> to וְתֵלֵד֙ <WH3205> unto her and she shall bear עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכַּ֔י <WH1290> upon my knees וְאִבָּנֶ֥ה <WH1129> that I may also have children גַם־ <WH1571> too אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> that מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> through

וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> And she gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְהָ֥ה <WH1090> him Bilhah שִׁפְחָתָ֖הּ <WH8198> her handmaid לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> went in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> and יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> and Jacob
וַתַּ֣הַר <WH2029> conceived בִּלְהָ֔ה <WH1090> And Bilhah וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and bare לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> a son

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said רָחֵל֙ <WH7354> And Rachel דָּנַ֣נִּי <WH1777> hath judged אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God וְגַם֙ <WH1571> indeed שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> me and hath also heard בְּקֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and hath given לִ֖י בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> me a son עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that קָרְאָ֥ה <WH7121> therefore called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she his name דָּֽן׃ <WH1835> Dan

וַתַּ֣הַר <WH2029> conceived ע֔וֹד <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֕לֶד <WH3205> again and bare בִּלְהָ֖ה <WH1090> And Bilhah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <WH8198> maid רָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> Rachel's בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> son שֵׁנִ֖י <WH8145> a second לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said רָחֵ֗ל <WH7354> And Rachel נַפְתּוּלֵ֨י <WH5319> wrestlings אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> With great נִפְתַּ֛לְתִּי <WH6617> have I wrestled עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲחֹתִ֖י <WH269> with my sister גַּם־ <WH1571> have indeed יָכֹ֑לְתִּי <WH3201> and I have prevailed וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> Naphtali

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <WH7200> saw לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> When Leah כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָמְדָ֖ה <WH5975> that she had left מִלֶּ֑דֶת <WH3205> bearing וַתִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> she took אֶת־ <WH853> זִלְפָּ֣ה <WH2153> Zilpah שִׁפְחָתָ֔הּ <WH8198> her maid וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> her Jacob לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife
וַתֵּ֗לֶד <WH3205> bare זִלְפָּ֛ה <WH2153> And Zilpah שִׁפְחַ֥ת <WH8198> maid לֵאָ֖ה <WH3812> Leah's לְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> Jacob בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> a son

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said לֵאָ֖ה <WH3812> And Leah [בְּגָד כ] (בָּ֣א <WH935> abide ק) (גָ֑ד <WH1409> troop ק) וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name גָּֽד׃ <WH1410> Gad
וַתֵּ֗לֶד <WH3205> bare זִלְפָּה֙ <WH2153> And Zilpah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <WH8198> maid לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> Leah's בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> son שֵׁנִ֖י <WH8145> a second לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> And Leah בְּאָשְׁרִ֕י <WH837> Happy am I כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִשְּׁר֖וּנִי <WH833> will call me blessed בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> for the daughters וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name אָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> Asher

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went רְאוּבֵ֜ן <WH7205> And Reuben בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> the days קְצִיר־ <WH7105> harvest חִטִּ֗ים <WH2406> of wheat וַיִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> and found דֽוּדָאִים֙ <WH1736> mandrakes בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> and brought אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about לֵאָ֖ה <WH3812> Leah אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> them unto his mother וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said רָחֵל֙ <WH7354> Then Rachel אֶל־ <WH413> to לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> to Leah תְּנִי־ <WH5414> Give me נָ֣א <WH4994> Please לִ֔י מִדּוּדָאֵ֖י <WH1736> mandrakes בְּנֵֽךְ׃ <WH1121> I pray thee of thy son's

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said לָ֗הּ הַמְעַט֙ <WH4592> unto her [Is it] a small matter קַחְתֵּ֣ךְ <WH3947> that thou hast taken אֶת־ <WH853> אִישִׁ֔י <WH582> you וְלָקַ֕חַת <WH3947> to take גַּ֥ם <WH1571> again אֶת־ <WH853> דּוּדָאֵ֖י <WH1736> mandrakes בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> my son's וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said רָחֵ֗ל <WH7354> also? And Rachel לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore יִשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> Therefore he shall lie עִמָּךְ֙ <WH5973> you הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> with thee to night תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> for דּוּדָאֵ֥י <WH1736> mandrakes בְנֵֽךְ׃ <WH1121> thy son's

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> And Jacob מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶה֮ <WH7704> out of the field בָּעֶרֶב֒ <WH6153> in the evening וַתֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> went out לֵאָ֜ה <WH3812> and Leah לִקְרָאת֗וֹ <WH7125> to meet וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> him and said אֵלַ֣י <WH413> about תָּב֔וֹא <WH935> Thou must come in כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שָׂכֹ֣ר <WH7936> unto me for surely שְׂכַרְתִּ֔יךָ <WH7936> I have hired בְּדוּדָאֵ֖י <WH1736> mandrakes בְּנִ֑י <WH1121> thee with my son's וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> And he lay עִמָּ֖הּ <WH5973> her that בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> with her that night הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to לֵאָ֑ה <WH3812> unto Leah וַתַּ֛הַר <WH2029> and she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and bare לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> son חֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> the fifth

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לֵאָ֗ה <WH3812> And Leah נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> hath given אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God שְׂכָרִ֔י <WH7939> me my hire אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> because נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> I have given שִׁפְחָתִ֖י <WH8198> my maiden לְאִישִׁ֑י <WH376> to my husband וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name יִשָּׂשכָֽר׃ <WH3485> Issachar
וַתַּ֤הַר <WH2029> conceived עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> And Leah וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> again and bare בֵּן־ <WH1121> son שִׁשִּׁ֖י <WH8345> the sixth לְּיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לֵאָ֗ה <WH3812> And Leah זְבָדַ֨נִי <WH2064> hath endued אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <WH430> God אֹתִי֮ <WH853> זֵ֣בֶד <WH2065> dowry טוֹב֒ <WH2896> me [with] a good הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <WH6471> now יִזְבְּלֵ֣נִי <WH2082> dwell אִישִׁ֔י <WH376> will my husband כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יָלַ֥דְתִּי <WH3205> with me because I have born ל֖וֹ שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> him six בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> sons וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <WH2074> Zebulun
וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> And afterwards יָ֣לְדָה <WH3205> she bare בַּ֑ת <WH1323> a daughter וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> her name דִּינָֽה׃ <WH1783> Dinah

וַיִּזְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> remembered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> Rachel וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> hearkened אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> and אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and God וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> to her and opened אֶת־ <WH853> רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <WH7358> her womb

וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> And she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said אָסַ֥ף <WH622> hath taken away אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> חֶרְפָּתִֽי׃ <WH2781> my reproach

וַתִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> And she called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֛וֹ <WH8034> his name יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> and said יֹסֵ֧ף <WH3254> shall add יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD לִ֖י בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> son אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> to me another

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> had born רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> And it came to pass when Rachel אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> that Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to לָבָ֔ן <WH3837> unto Laban שַׁלְּחֵ֙נִי֙ <WH7971> Send me away וְאֵ֣לְכָ֔ה <WH1980> may go אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמִ֖י <WH4725> unto mine own place וּלְאַרְצִֽי׃ <WH776> and to my country

תְּנָ֞ה <WH5414> Give אֶת־ <WH853> נָשַׁ֣י <WH802> [me] my wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְלָדַ֗י <WH3206> and my children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom עָבַ֧דְתִּי <WH5647> whom I have served אֹֽתְךָ֛ <WH853> בָּהֵ֖ן <WH2004> for וְאֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> depart כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> yourself יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> for thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדָתִ֖י <WH5656> my service אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֲבַדְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH5647> which I have done

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> But לָבָ֔ן <WH3837> And Laban אִם־ <WH518> If נָ֛א <WH4994> now מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> unto him I pray thee if I have found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thine eyes נִחַ֕שְׁתִּי <WH5172> [tarry for] I have learned by experience וַיְבָרֲכֵ֥נִי <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD בִּגְלָלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1558> me for thy sake
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said נָקְבָ֧ה <WH5344> Appoint שְׂכָרְךָ֛ <WH7939> me thy wages עָלַ֖י <WH5921> and I וְאֶתֵּֽנָה׃ <WH5414> and I will give

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> yourself יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> unto him Thou knowest אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> how עֲבַדְתִּ֑יךָ <WH5647> I have served וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> thee and how הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> have fared מִקְנְךָ֖ <WH4735> thy cattle אִתִּֽי׃ <WH854> for

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for מְעַט֩ <WH4592> For [it was] little אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> had לְךָ֤ לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> which thou hadst before I וַיִּפְרֹ֣ץ <WH6555> [came] and it is [now] increased לָרֹ֔ב <WH7230> unto a multitude וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> לְרַגְלִ֑י <WH7272> thee since my coming וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now מָתַ֛י <WH4970> and now when אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shall I provide גַם־ <WH1571> again אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> own לְבֵיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> for mine own house

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָ֣ה <WH4100> What אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> What shall I give thee לָ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ? And Jacob לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִתֶּן־ <WH5414> Thou shalt not give לִ֣י מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> me any thing אִם־ <WH518> If תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> if thou wilt do לִּי֙ הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אָשׁ֛וּבָה <WH7725> for me I will again אֶרְעֶ֥ה <WH7462> feed צֹֽאנְךָ֖ <WH6629> thy flock אֶשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> [and] keep

אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר <WH5674> I will pass בְּכָל־ <WH3605> your entire צֹֽאנְךָ֜ <WH6629> through all thy flock הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> to day הָסֵ֨ר <WH5493> removing מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> there כָּל־ <WH3605> every שֶׂ֣ה ׀ <WH7716> cattle נָקֹ֣ד <WH5348> from thence all the speckled וְטָל֗וּא <WH2921> and spotted וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every שֶׂה־ <WH7716> cattle חוּם֙ <WH2345> and all the brown בַּכְּשָׂבִ֔ים <WH3775> among the sheep וְטָל֥וּא <WH2921> and the spotted וְנָקֹ֖ד <WH5348> and speckled בָּעִזִּ֑ים <WH5795> among the goats וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become שְׂכָרִֽי׃ <WH7939> and [of such] shall be my hire
